Sunhawk swoops down and transforms.  He cuts off
Warhead's head and gives it to Kup.

Sunhawk:  Without this they can't revive him, now get
back to base.  I'll hold Megatron off long enough for
you to get a head start and then if no reinforcements
arrive I'l get out of here. NOW GO!

He fires 8 shots at Megatron (laser).

--- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
> OOC: Yeah, just bring Warhead back and he should be
> fine.
> 
> Bic: Warhead was still lying on the ground in a
> stasis lock.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...>
> wrote:
> > If that's what you like to do, then perhaps you
> should do it, and 
> > not otherwise. At the moment, you didn't post for
> dodging Megatron's 
> > attack, Sunhawk grabbed Megatron and put him into
> a headlock, and 
> > then turned him around to face Kup's weaponfire.
> THAT is what's 
> > wrong. You should be posting that Sunhawks tries
> to grab Megatron to 
> > put him into a headlock, not that he suddenly has
> him in a headlock. 
> > =)
> > 
> > Cause talking ooc style is delaying Megatron, I'm
> going to just go 
> > with that you've done. I'm not sure that Azure
> wants Warhead dead, 
> > so Megatron is going to just try to run with
> Warhead. Heh, he's got 
> > the whole maximal base running him down right now
> eh. =P

> side. The over

> get him into a

> >

> Kup's shots, a char 
> > mark appears on his back armour, then he grabs for
> Sunhawk's legs, 
> > attempting to try to throw him at Kup, along with
> a plasma blast. 
> > (he's going to throw Sunhawk and try to hit him
> with a plasma blast 
> > after the throw)
> >
